price: (15) Say, "Is that better or the Garden of Eternity which is promised to the righteous? It will be for them a reward and destination.
arabic: قُلۡ أَذَٰلِكَ خَيۡرٌ أَمۡ جَنَّةُ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ ٱلَّتِي وُعِدَ ٱلۡمُتَّقُونَۚ كَانَتۡ لَهُمۡ جَزَآءٗ وَمَصِيرٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qul adhālika khayrun am jannatu al-khul'di allatī wuʿida al-mutaqūna kānat lahum jazāan wamaṣīran
